q1.question: When will Aetheris be released?
q1.answer: Aetheris is currently in development. We will announce a release date as soon as possible. Follow us on social media to stay informed!

q2.question: What platforms will Aetheris be available on?
q2.answer: Aetheris will first be available on PC (Windows). We are considering other platforms in the future.

q3.question: Will there be a multiplayer mode?
q3.answer: Yes! Aetheris will offer a cooperative multiplayer mode in addition to single-player.

q4.question: How can I follow the development?
q4.answer: Follow us on Twitter, Instagram, YouTube and TikTok for regular updates, devlogs and game previews!

meta.title: Aetheris - Survival Game
meta.description: Aetheris - A stylized survival and exploration game set in a world of floating islands. Build your airship, explore the skies and discover the mysteries.

hero.subtitle: Survival • Exploration • Crafting
hero.description: Explore a fantasy world of floating islands, build your airship and survive in the skies.

survive.title: Survive
survive.description: The floating islands are full of resources to gather, but beware of the dangers that await you. Manage your resources, craft your tools and build your base to face the challenges of the skies.

create.title: Create
create.description: Build your airship piece by piece and customize it according to your playstyle. Upgrade your base, create tools and equipment to make your adventure easier.

explore.title: Explore
explore.description: Each island hides its own secrets and unique resources. Travel from biome to biome, discover ancient ruins and uncover the mysteries of this suspended world.

community.description: Follow Aetheris development, share your feedback and be the first to know about updates!
